name: Extended Ritual
description: Exalt in the sacred light of the Aedra, cleansing up to 5 harmful effects from yourself immediately and healing you and nearby allies for 870 Health every 2 seconds for 24 seconds.  Allies in the area can activate the Purify synergy, cleansing all harmful effects from themselves and healing for 1886 Health.
effectLines: Increases the duration and the amount of harmful effects cleansed from yourself.
coefDescription: Exalt in the sacred light of the Aedra, cleansing up to 5 harmful effects from yourself immediately and healing you and nearby allies for $1 Health every 2 seconds for 24 seconds.  Allies in the area can activate the Purify synergy, cleansing all harmful effects from themselves and healing for $2 Health.
rawDescription:
Exalt in the sacred light of the Aedra, cleansing up to <<1>> harmful effects from yourself immediately and healing you and nearby allies for <<2>> Health every <<3>> for <<4>>.

Allies in the area can activate the <<5>> synergy, cleansing all harmful effects from themselves and healing for <<6>> Health.
